ygData.subject: Re: Ward The Undead
ygData.msgSnippet: I hear it does 38(+1/level) dam to undead.  In other words, a base damage of 38, and + 1 for each level after eight. Say,  you get 40 dam to undead once you
ygData.messageBody:
I hear it does 38(+1/level) dam to undead. In other words, a base
damage of 38, and + 1 for each level after eight. Say, you get 40 dam to
undead once you reach 10th level. Something like that.

That may not be 100% correct, but it's what I've been told at least.
And it is doing 38pts of dam for me at level eight at the moment. Nice
spell. Looking forward to Dominate Undead. Going to have fun with some
Dreads....Just have a long way to go.

~Myskyra

----- Original Message -----
From: Douglas Kendall <lachdanan@...>
To: <eq_necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, April 17, 1999 6:20 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Ward The Undead


> From: Douglas Kendall <lachdanan@...>
>
> What does that spell do? How does it work as you cast it on yourself,
> but no icon shows like aura, unless it replaces it? Play on Povar, a
> Gnome, and need some player friends.
